articles.author: David Ingram
articles.title: Antisemites are saying Elon Musk is on their side after his latest tweets about Jews - NBC News
articles.description: SAN FRANCISCO — Tech billionaire Elon Musk faced backlash from some Jewish leaders and at least one advertiser Thursday after he again embraced an antisemitic conspiracy theory, the latest in a pattern of his echoing anti-Jewish bigotry going back years.

articles.title: IT pros wary as Microsoft Copilot juggernaut gains steam - TechTarget
articles.description: Microsoft is now 'The Copilot company,' along with GitHub, but concerns linger about the accuracy of AI-generated results, code lineage and long-term job security.
